metadata.synopsis: AD that plays after the bard has been told to start over. She is holding her lute. Not plucking it occasionally but not really playing.

1.speaker: Alfira
1.context: NodeContext: Player has convinced her to start from scratch with the song. Doubts herself. Hates what she's working on. Dejected.
